seg.source: 一户流氓家庭在遭驱逐前毁坏位于康沃尔郡索尔塔什的廉租房
seg.translation: A family of hooligans wrecked low-rent housing in Saltash Cornwall before being evicted
A family of rogue families destroyed a low-rent house in Sortas, Cornwall, before being deported.
A rogue family destroys low-rent housing in Saltash, Cornwall, before being evicted

seg.source: 因恐吓邻居而遭驱逐的一户流氓家庭，在离开前对其所住廉租房进行了破坏，造成了50000英镑的损失。
seg.translation: A family of miscreants who was evicted for terrorizing their neighbors vandalized their cheap rental property before leaving, causing a loss of 50,000 Sterling pounds.
A family of rogue families who had been evicted for threatening their neighbours had damaged their low-rent housing before leaving, costing 50000 of pounds.
A rogue family evicted for intimidating neighbours caused £50,000 in damage to their low-rent accommodation before leaving.

seg.source: 在遭到一长串的投诉后，Tanya Skeldon 与其丈夫 Shaun Trebilcock 被赶出了位于康沃尔郡索尔塔什的廉租房。
seg.translation: After receiving a long string of complaints, Tanya Skeldon and her husband Shaun Trebilcock were evicted from their cheap rental property located at Saltash in Cornwall County.
After a long list of complaints, Tanya Skeldon and her husband, Shaun Trebilcock, were evicted from a low-rent house in the Cornish County of Sortas.
Tanya Skeldon and her husband Shaun Trebilcock were evicted from their low-rent house in Soltash, Cornwall, after a long list of complaints.

seg.source: 在被强制从该住所遣离后，住房协会官员惊讶地发现这里遭到了严重破坏。
seg.translation: The officials of housing association was stunned to discover the place was damaged severely after the forced evacuation.
After being forcibly removed from the residence, housing association officials were surprised to find that there had been serious damage.
After being forcibly removed from the residence, housing association officials were surprised to find that it had been severely damaged.

seg.source: 墙上到处是洞，地板被扯破了，垃圾扔得满地都是，墙壁上被涂的乱七八糟。
seg.translation: The walls are covered with holes. The floor has been ripped up. Garbage is strewn everywhere, and there is graffiti all over the walls.
The walls were full of holes, the floors torn, the rubbish strewn all over the floor, the walls smeared with clutter.
There were holes all over the walls, the floor was ripped, garbage was thrown all over the floor, and the walls were covered in a mess.

seg.source: 遭到驱逐后，这家人一直在搬家，据说目前住在私人住宅
seg.translation: The family has been moving after the evacuation. It was said they are lodging in a private residence.
After being expelled, the family has been moving and is said to be living in a private house.
The family has been moving since being evicted and is said to be currently living in a private home

seg.source: 康沃尔郡住房协会房屋经理 Donna McEvoy 说，她担心这处房子已经无法挽救了。
seg.translation: Donna McEvoy, housing manager at Cornwall Housing, said she feared the house would be beyond rescue.
Donna McEvoy, housing manager at Cornwall County Housing Association, said she feared the house could not be saved.
Donna McEvoy, housing manager for the Cornwall Housing Association, said she was concerned the house was beyond saving.

seg.source: 她说：“对于住在这里的人们来说，这就是一场噩梦，我不认为人可以这样生活。”
seg.translation: She said, “For the people who live here, this is a nightmare. I don’t think people can live like that.”
"It's a nightmare for people who live here, and I don't think people can live like this," she said. ”
"It's a nightmare for the people who live here, and I don't think people can live like that," she said.

seg.source: 现在有很多事情需要权衡，因为这处房屋很可能会成为康沃尔郡一个不太好的元素。
seg.translation: There are many things that must be considered. This house may become a negative factor for Cornwall County.
There are a lot of things to weigh now, because this House is likely to become a bad element in Cornwall.
There are a lot of things to weigh in now because the house is likely to be a bad element in Cornwall.

seg.source: 这户家庭臭名昭著，他们的名字同样臭名昭著。
seg.translation: This family is infamous, and their name is equally notorious.
The family is notorious and their names are equally notorious.
The family is notorious, and their names are equally notorious.

seg.source: 这对夫妇有三个儿子，他们会不时住在这里。警方表示，这户人家的恐怖行为包括使用棒球棍在街头打架、恐吓附近居民、吸毒、贩毒、大喊大叫、争吵以及咒骂。
seg.translation: This couple has 3 sons. They would live here every now and then. The police expressed that the household commits terror activities that include fighting in the street with baseball bats, intimidating nearby residents, drug abuse, drug dealing, shouting, arguing, and cursing.

The couple had three sons and they would live here from time out. Police said the family's terrorist acts include the use of baseball bats in the streets to fight, intimidation of nearby residents, drugs, drug trafficking, shouting, quarrels and swearing.

The couple, who have three sons, will live here from time to time.Police said the family's terror included using baseball bats to fight in the streets, terrorising nearby residents, taking drugs, drug trafficking, shouting, arguing and swearing.

seg.source: 六月份，这位名叫 Skeldon 的47岁租客收到了一份反社会行为决议。
seg.translation: In June, a 47-year old renter named Skeldon received a resolution for his anti-social behaviors.
In June, the 47-year-old tenant named Skeldon received a resolution on anti-social behavior.
The 47-year-old tenant, Skeldon, received an anti-social behaviour resolution in June.

seg.source: 在这栋可能遭到拆除的房子里，许多房间都是放置许久的垃圾
seg.translation: Trashed-filled rooms in a house that may be demolished
In a house that could be demolished, many of the rooms are long rubbish.
Many of the rooms in the house, which is likely to be demolished, are long standing rubbish

seg.source: 在这间曾经交易过毒品的房间里，地板被掀起来了
seg.translation: Floorboards of the room where drugs were traded were lifted
In this room where the drugs were traded, the floors were lifted.
The floor was lifted in the room where the drugs had been sold

seg.source: 邻居称，经常看到他们在街头打架，也经常因此报警
seg.translation: Neighboring residents said that they often see them fighting in the streets, and often called the police to deal with this.
Neighbors say they often see them fighting in the streets, and they often call the police
Neighbours claimed they were often seen fighting in the streets and often called police over the incident

seg.source: 在给了11周的延长期让他们自愿搬离后，康沃尔郡住房协会本周强行将她与她的丈夫驱离该住所。
seg.translation: After giving an 11-week extension to voluntarily leave the place, the Cornwall County Residential Authority forcibly evicted her and her husband from their residence this week.
After giving them a 11-week extension, the Cornish Housing Society forced her and her husband to drive away from the house this week.
The Cornwall Housing Society this week forcibly removed her from the residence with her husband after giving them an 11-week extension to move voluntarily.

seg.source: 终于松了口气的邻居们为此欢呼不已，他们表示，之前的生活简直是人间地狱。
seg.translation: Neighbors who finally breathed a sign of relief cheered because of this. They said that life in the past was a living hell.
The neighbors, who finally breathed a sigh of joy, said that life had been a living hell.
Neighbours who were finally relieved cheered, saying that life had been a living hell.

seg.source: 一位邻居说道：“他们不在乎任何人。”
seg.translation: A neighbor said: “They don't care about anyone.”
"They don't care about anyone," said one neighbour. ”
"They don't care about anyone," said one neighbour.

seg.source: 我们在他们隔壁住了20年，一直这么糟糕。
seg.translation: We lived next to them for 20 years. It’s been terrible all this time.
We've lived next door to them for 20 years, and it's been so bad.
We've been living next door to them for 20 years and it's been so bad.

seg.source: 我们曾无数次看到警察登门。
seg.translation: We have seen the police come by many times.
We've seen the police countless times.
We've seen the police at the door countless times.

seg.source: “今天早晨，我们竟睡不着了。”
seg.translation: “We couldn’t sleep this morning.”
"We couldn't sleep this morning." ”
"This morning we couldn't sleep.

seg.source: 我们早早就起床了，因为这里太安静了——我们还不习惯呢！
seg.translation: We woke up early because it was just too quiet. We are not used to this yet!
We got up early because it was so quiet-we weren't used to it!
We get up early because it's so quiet here - we're not used to it yet!

seg.source: 他们终于走了，真是太好了。
seg.translation: They finally left. Thank goodness.
It's very kind of them to leave at last.
It's great that they're finally gone.

seg.source: 康沃尔郡住房协会社区执行经理 Adam Fitzpatrick 说道，这户人家没能好好配合当地政府。
seg.translation: Cornwall Housing's neighborhood enforcement manager Adam Fitzpatrick said that this family failed to cooperate with the local government.
Fitzpatrick, the Community executive manager of the Cornish Housing Society, said the family had failed to cooperate with the local government.
Adam Fitzpatrick, community executive manager of the Cornwall Housing Association, said the family had failed to cooperate with the local government.

seg.source: 这家人在这所房子里住了20年，警察经常造访
seg.translation: The family lived in this house for 20 years and has been frequented by the police
The family lived in the house for 20 years and the police often visited
The family has lived in the house for 20 years and is regularly visited by police

seg.source: 垃圾和旧玩具被扔在该廉租房杂草丛生的一边
seg.translation: Rubbish and old toys are thrown at the side of the low-rent housing project where weeds are overgrown
Rubbish and old toys were tossed over the overgrown side of the low-rent rent
Garbage and old toys were thrown on the overgrown side of the tenement

seg.source: 他补充说：“令人遗憾的是，该房客没有为她与家人的行为而负任何责任，驱逐是康沃尔郡住房协会最后考虑的做法。”
seg.translation: He added: “What is disappointing is that the tenant did not bear any responsibility for the actions that she and her family members have committed. Eviction is the final measure considered by the Cornwall residence committee.”
He added: "It is regrettable that the tenant has not been held responsible for the conduct of her family and the expulsion is the last thing considered by the Cornwall Housing Association." ”
He added: "It is regrettable that the tenant did not take any responsibility for her behaviour with her family and the eviction was the last thing the Cornwall Housing Association considered."

seg.source: 这是一起非常难处理的案件，因为他们的行为非常极端，而他们的所作所为也一定让邻居们感到万分恐惧。
seg.translation: This is a very difficult case to handle because their behavior was rather extreme. What they did must have terrified the neighbors.
This is a very difficult case to deal with, because their behavior is very extreme, and what they do must make the neighbors feel extremely terrified.
It was a very difficult case to deal with because their behaviour was so extreme and what they were doing must have been extremely frightening for the neighbours.

seg.source: 我感谢我的团队所做的工作，也要感谢德文郡与康沃尔郡警方以及勇敢向我们提供信息的社区成员。
seg.translation: I thank my team for the work they have done. I also want to thank the Devon and Cornwall Police as well as members of the community who have courageously provided us with information.
I am thankful for the work done by my team and thanks to the Devon and Cornwall Police as well as the community members who are brave enough to provide us with information.
I thank my team for their work, as well as Devon and Cornwall Police and members of the community who have been brave enough to provide us with information.

seg.source: 我希望此举将给邻居们带来些许安慰，并传递这样一个信息：我们对反社会行为绝不容忍。
seg.translation: I hope that this act will bring some comfort to the neighborhood, and transmit this message: We shall not tolerate anti-social behavior.
I hope this will bring some comfort to our neighbors and convey the message that we are not tolerant of anti-social behaviour.
I hope this will provide some comfort to our neighbours and send a message that we will not tolerate anti-social behaviour.

seg.source: Fitzpatrick 先生表示，他们的三个儿子在不同时期都在这个房子里住过，但是也说了，他们都才20多岁。
seg.translation: Mr. Fitzpatrick expressed that their three sons have lived in this house at different times, but he also added that they're only in their twenties.
Mr Fitzpatrick says three of their sons lived in the house at different times, but said they were only more than 20 years old.
Mr Fitzpatrick said their three sons had lived in the house at various times, but said they were all in their 20s.

seg.source: 在他们遭驱离后，其中一间卧室的地板上还扔着一个脏床垫
seg.translation: After they were evicted, a dirty mattress was left on the floor of one of the bedrooms
After they were driven away, one of the bedroom floors was littered with a dirty mattress.
A dirty mattress was also thrown on the floor of one of the bedrooms after they were removed

seg.source: 住房协会工人很快将清理房子周围成堆的垃圾
seg.translation: Housing association workers swiftly cleaned up heaps of garbage around the house
Housing association workers will soon be cleaning up piles of rubbish around the house
Housing association workers will soon be clearing piles of rubbish around the house

seg.source: 2014年，警方曾搜查了该房屋，发现了70多克大麻，还发现了天平、吸毒用具及1,700英镑现金。
seg.translation: In 2014, police had searched this house and found more than 70 grams of marijuana, as well as scales, drug kits and GPB1,700 in cash.
In 2014, police raided the house, found more than 70 grams of cannabis, and found scales, drug paraphernalia and 1,700 pounds of cash.
In 2014, police had searched the house and found 70 grams of marijuana, as well as scales, drug paraphernalia and £1,700 in cash.

seg.source: 认罪后，Skeldon 因持有 B 类毒品及贩卖毒品意图被处以罚款。
seg.translation: After pleading guilty, Skeldon was fined for possession of Class B drugs and intent to traffick drugs.
After pleading guilty, Skeldon was fined for possessing class B drugs and drug trafficking.
After pleading guilty, Skeldon was fined for possession of Class B drugs and trafficking in drugs with intent.

seg.source: 她声称，钱是用来给2013年死于车祸的儿子 Lee Skeldon 买墓碑的。
seg.translation: She claimed that the money would be used to buy a headstone for her son, Lee Skeldon, who died in a car accident in 2013.
She claims that the money was used to buy gravestones for the son Lee Skeldon, who died in a car accident in 2013.
She claimed the money was used to buy a tombstone for her son, Lee Skeldon, who died in a car crash in 2013.

seg.source: 据了解，在无家可归后，Tanya 与其丈夫现在住在普利茅斯的一处私人房屋。
seg.translation: From our understanding, after losing her home, Tanya and her husband is now residing at a private house at Plymouth.
It is understood that after homeless, Tanya and her husband now live in a private house in Plymouth.
It is understood Tanya and her husband now live in a private house in Plymouth after becoming homeless.

seg.source: 该住房多间房间的墙上都画满了涂鸦。
seg.translation: Graffiti littered the walls of many of the rooms in this residence.
The walls of the house were painted with graffiti.
The walls of many of the rooms in the house were covered with graffiti.

seg.source: 警方表示，他们将驱逐违抗租户规则的租客。
seg.translation: The police expressed that they will evict any tenant who violate the tenants’ rule of conduct.
Police said they would expel tenants who defied tenant rules.
Police said they would evict tenants who defied the tenants' rules.

seg.source: 德文郡与康沃尔郡警局的 Angela Crow 表示，此次驱逐向其他继续违抗租户规则的租客发出了明确警告。
seg.translation: Angela Crow of the police department of Devon and Cornwall said that this eviction will send a clear warning to tenants who continue to violate the tenants’ code of conduct.
Angela Crow, of Devon and the Cornish Police Department, said the eviction sent a clear warning to other tenants who continued to defy tenant rules.
Angela Crow, of Devon and Cornwall Police, said the eviction issued a clear warning to other tenants who continued to defy tenant rules.

seg.source: “这一警告针对的是那些认为自己的行为不会受到指责，以及那些受这种行为摧残的人们，”她说。
seg.translation: “This warning is directed as those who think that nobody will complain about their behaviors, and for people who were victimized by such behaviors,” she said.
"The warning is for people who think their actions are not being blamed, and those who have been devastated by this behavior," she said.
"This warning is for people who don't think they're going to be blamed for their actions, and for people who have been devastated by it," she said.

seg.source: 德文郡与康沃尔郡警局绝不容忍犯罪与反社会行为，他们将继续携手合作伙伴保护我们的社区。
seg.translation: Police departments of Devon and Cornwall tolerate zero criminal and anti-social activity. They will continue protecting our community with partners.
Devon and Cornwall Police will never tolerate crime and anti-social behaviour, and they'll continue to work with partners to protect our communities.
Devon and Cornwall Police do not tolerate crime and anti-social behaviour and will continue to work with partners to protect our communities.
